clues.name: Their name was passed down like a mountain wind, starting with M and common in their homeland.
clues.place: They came from a misty region whose name begins with M — a land now silent.
clues.animal: A loyal companion followed them, strong-hoofed and steady, bearing the mark of M.
clues.thing: What they carried was sacred. An object of M, wrapped in bark and mystery.

clues.name: A name that whispers through dunes, soft and strong, starting with S.
clues.place: They hailed from the southern sands, where the sun scorched the start of every story with S.
clues.animal: Their protector slithered through shadows, scaled and silent.
clues.thing: Wrapped in satchels, their sacred object shimmered — a stone of stories.

clues.name: Like wind through willows, their name wandered from tongue to tongue.
clues.place: Where woods weave their green spell — this place begins with W.
clues.animal: A creature of bark and howl, their companion watched from shadows.
clues.thing: A carved whistle, once blown by elders, hidden in woven wraps.

clues.name: Thunder in their step, their name traveled far with tales — and it began with T.
clues.place: The great plains they called home bore a name like thunder.
clues.animal: A fleet-footed companion, tufted and tireless.
clues.thing: In their satchel, a token of trust: a talisman wrapped in tradition.

clues.name: Their name lingered like moonlight over the ocean — it began with L.
clues.place: An isle lost to tides and time, whispered as L.
clues.animal: Gliding through salt and spray, their ally leaped and laughed.
clues.thing: An ancient lantern, lit only during lunar rites.

clues.name: Their name began with Q, carried by stories whispered around campfires.
clues.place: A land lost in time, its name starting with Q, remembered by wandering maps.
clues.animal: A companion of instinct and motion, marked by Q, roamed beside them.
clues.thing: An heirloom, hidden in cloth, carried the essence of Q.
